data.description:
**Features:**

- Free engraving on the back
- Educational value: helps babies learn to spell their names and recognize animals
- Highly customizable: 16 different animal head options and 25 color choices for each letter
- High-quality materials: made of linden wood, which is lightweight and soft, and water-based, non-toxic paints
- Optional pegs: can be used to attach the puzzle pieces to a surface

**Dimensions:**

- Each puzzle set is 3/8 inch thick in total.
- Letters are 1/5 inch thick and are raised an 1/8 inch above the front of the puzzle

**Ordering:**

- You will be required to type your requests in the personalization box when you checkout.
- Please write below:
    1)  name of the baby
    2) color number for each letter
    3) animal numbers

**Turnaround:**

- All puzzles are custom made made to order.
- Please allow 10-15 business days for delivery after ordering.

uniqueAttributes.High-quality materials: The product is made of linden wood, which is lightweight and soft, making it safe for babies to play with. The water-based, non-toxic paints used to color the letters ensure the safety of the product.
uniqueAttributes.Optional pegs: The product comes with optional pegs, which can be used to attach the puzzle pieces to a surface, making it easier for babies to play with and prevent the pieces from getting lost.

data.description: Our beautiful musical carousels are the perfect keepsake for your little love. Made from beech wood and featuring a sweet tune when turned, our carousels are the perfect piece to treasure for years to come. Each carousel is 11cm wide x 18cm high, and can be lovingly engraved on the front in our timeless script and serif fonts. Choose from ballerinas or horse etched design. data.description: The Adventure Book Scrapbook is a personalized gift perfect for couples, anniversaries, or Valentine's Day. It features a vegan leather fabric binding, cherry or maple wood covers, and your choice of 30, 45, or 60 sheets of acid-free paper. The designs are laser engraved with your unique details, making every book one-of-a-kind. The book is available in two sizes (6"x9" or 8.5"x11") and three paper types (28lb Standard Paper with blank white sheets, or 65lb Cardstock Paper with blank black, cream, or white sheets). The wood color and grain will vary naturally from the example photo, and the wooden covers are coated with a lacquer finish to prevent scratches and provide a water-resistant coating. To order, select a book size and type of wood, choose sheet quantity and paper type, and provide the following information in the "Add your personalization" box: screw color (gold, black, silver, or copper), binding color (see listing photos for all options), text to be engraved, any other details (such as special design requests and timing deadlines), and whether you would like a proof of the cover. The book is made with high-quality materials and craftsmanship, and the laser engraving ensures that your designs will be precise and durable. It is a unique and thoughtful gift that will be cherished for years to come.
